channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- ABAP Server and ABAP Platform (SAP Basis)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- ABAP Server and ABAP Platform (SAP Basis)

item.title: CVE-2019-0321|2024-08-04T17:44:16.476Z -- sap%20se -- abap%20server%20and%20abap%20platform%20%28sap%20basis%29
item.description: ABAP Server and ABAP Platform (SAP Basis), versions, 7.31, 7.4, 7.5, do not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
